arts.ttl: Coventry City squad list revealed as plenty of room for free agent signing
arts.sum: Two players – Norman Bassette and Raphael Borges Rodrigues – have dropped out of the original senior squad named in August and joined the contracted list of players under-21, while Fabio Tavares has obviously been removed after joining Burton on loan and Jack Burroughs come into the mix after being recalled from his loan north of the border. Coventry City's registered squad for the second half of the season

arts.ttl: Frank Lampard makes Coventry City admission as character sees Sky Blues prosper
arts.sum: Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group. Frank Lampard was delighted with the character of his Coventry City players to snatch a late victory over QPR to lift the team up to eighth place in the table, just one point off the play-off places.

arts.ttl: Cifuentes annoyed by QPR’s costly late lapse
arts.sum: Marti Cifuentes was annoyed by the late lapse which led to QPR losing at Coventry. Bobby Thomas headed in a corner deep into stoppage time to win the game for the hosts. It came shortly after successive Rangers corners dismally came to nothing. Thomas appeared to foul Steve Cook before connecting with Jack Rudoni’s delivery […] The post Cifuentes annoyed by QPR’s costly late lapse appeared first on West London Sport.

QPR lost 1-0 at Coventry after conceding a stoppage-time goal. Bobby Thomas headed in Jack Rudoni’s corner – shortly after successive corners at the other end dismally came to nothing. Here’s how we rated each Rangers player. Paul Nardi: 6 Produced a fine double save in the first half, diving to his right to stop […] The post Coventry v QPR player ratings appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Lampard's Coventry snatch late win over QPR
arts.sum: Bobby Thomas scored a winner in the fourth minute of stoppage time as Coventry beat QPR 1-0 at the CBS Arena.

arts.ttl: Coventry City player ratings v QPR after Sky Blues leave it late to edge closer to the play-offs - Andy Turner
arts.sum: And it was Grimes who went closest for the home side in the opening 45 minutes with a hard and low effort from just outside the box from one of six first half corners, while Ellis Simms was denied by the keeper twice in quick succession in the area. City had the better of the chances in an entertaining first half in which Frank Lampard’s men enjoyed plenty of possession and knocked the ball about well, aided by new man Matt Grimes who showed a good range of passing on his full debut.

arts.ttl: Bobby Thomas snatches Coventry victory against QPR
arts.sum: Thomas nodded in from Jack Rudoni’s corner to earn Frank Lampard’s men a fifth win in six league outings.

arts.ttl: Four Coventry City changes and two return to the matchday squad from injury to face QPR
arts.sum: City: Oliver Dovin; Bobby Thomas, Luis Binks, Liam Kitching; Milan van Ewijk, Victor Torp, Matt Grimes, Tatsuhiro Sakamoto, Jack Rudoni, Jay Dasilva; Ellis Simms. Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group.

arts.ttl: Coventry v QPR line-ups: Colback starts for Rangers
arts.sum: Jack Colback starts for QPR in tonight’s game, while Michael Frey leads the attack. It means Kieran Morgan and Alfie Lloyd must settle for places on the bench. QPR: Nardi; Dunne, Cook, Edwards, Paal; Colback, Field; Smyth, Chair, Saito; Frey. : Subs: Walsh, Fox, Ashby, Morrison, Madsen, Morgan, Varane, Lloyd, Min-Hyeok. Coventry: to follow.
